health.author: Lee Cowan
health.title: A study to devise nutritional guidance just for you - AOL
health.description: When it comes to eating healthy, all of us respond to foods differently. The National Institutes of Health's new nutrition study hopes to finally provide Americans a personalized answer to the question: "What should I eat?"
health.content: It's been said the best meals come from the heart, not from a recipe book. But at this USDA kitchen, there's no pinch of this, dash of that, no dollops or smidgens of anything. Here, nutritionists in… [+5015 chars]

health.title: Trump names a Fox News personality, a COVID mandate critic and an anti-vaccine doctor to key public health roles - PBS NewsHour
health.description: Trump on Friday nominated Dr. Janette Nesheiwat to be the nation's next surgeon general, Dr. Marty Makary to lead the Food and Drug Administration, and doctor and former Rep. Dave Weldon, R-Fla., to lead the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
health.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President-elect Donald Trump on Friday nominated Dr. Marty Makary to lead the Food and Drug Administration, selecting a surgeon and author who gained national attention for opposing v… [+5571 chars]
